0: I'm the one, baby, yeah, I'm the one, baby
1: Since God gave his only begotten son, baby
2: It's hard preachin' the gospel to the slums lately
3: So I had to put the church on the drums, baby
4: You on a run, baby, you on a run, baby
5: You think you free but you a slave to the funds, baby
6: You think you me, but you ain't me, what you done lately?
7: Mhm that's cool but I been runnin on the sun, baby
8: We on a galaxy the haters cannot visit
9: That's my reality so get off my Scott Disick
10: If you ever held a title belt, you would know how Michael felt
12: Yeahhh, had to take it to another realm
13: Cause everything around me got me underwhelmed
14: Best way to describe my position is at the helm
15: Best way to describe my new whip - Yeeeaaaalmmp
title: The One
